abstract: The Brighton Veteran Car Run takes place annually with a procession of pre-1905 cars driving from London to Brighton, about 60 miles away, this year from Nov. 4 to 6.
snippet: The Brighton Veteran Car Run takes place annually with a procession of pre-1905 cars driving from London to Brighton, about 60 miles away, this year from Nov. 4 to 6.

headline.main: Antique Cars on Display, and on the Road, in London
